entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
